评论详情: I've been wearing Cherokee scrubs and this is my first foray into Mediclo's line. You have to get used to the feel of the fabric - it's way different than Cherokee's poly/cotton/spandex blend. Very light, almost feels like tent or umbrella cloth, but you can tell the fabric is high quality and will endure. If not, I'll update.
I love it, it has an excellent fit, the color is very nice, the fabric is comfortable, fresh, light and soft. I recommend it with my eyes closed.
